original_text: The workers used blue, purple and red material to make beautiful clothes for the priests. They would wear them when they served God in the Holy Place. They made these special clothes for Aaron, as the Lord had commanded Moses.
korean_text: 그들은 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 청색 자색 홍색 실로 성소에서 섬길 때 입을 정교한 옷을 만들고 또 아론을 위해 거룩한 옷을 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: The workers used blue, purple and red material
sentences.korean_translation: 일꾼들은 파란색, 보라색, 빨간색 재료를 사용했습니다

sentences.original_text: to make beautiful clothes for the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들을 위한 아름다운 옷을 만들기 위해

sentences.original_text: when they served God in the Holy Place
They made these special clothes for Aaron
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아론을 위해 이 특별한 옷들을 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: as the Lord had commanded Moses
